fields.title: format_version
fields.description: Version of the JSON schema for this file. Aim-assist preset requires at least version 1.21.50.

fields.title: minecraft:aim_assist_preset
fields.description: A single Camera Aim-Assist Preset Definition.

fields.title: identifier
fields.description: Namespaced identifier for Camera Aim-Assist preset. Namespace and name must be separated by a ':'.

fields.title: liquid_targeting_list
fields.description: Optional. List of item identifiers that will target liquid blocks with aim-assist when being held.

fields.title: item_settings
fields.description: Optional. Map of Item identifiers to Aim-Assist Category names found in the specified 'categories'.

fields.title: exclusion_list
fields.description: Optional. List of block/entity identifiers to exclude from aim assist targeting.

fields.title: default_item_settings
fields.description: Optional. Default Aim-Assist Category used for Items not found in 'item_settings'.

fields.title: hand_settings
fields.description: Optional. Aim-assist Category used for an empty hand.
